name: Number VII
additionalNotes: Rusty's Cigars present the marriage of Peter Stokkebye's Nougat blend of pipe tobacco with a specially selected blend of, Havana seed Honduran and Nicaraguan premium long filler. The binder is Cuban seed, grown in Honduras. All the tobaccos are then rolled in a beautiful Indonesian tobacco leaf. Each cigar is prepared by seasoned professionals under the watchful eyes of the famous Carlos Torano. Rusty's Cigars bring two old traditions together to create one great smoking experience. Enjoy.
